title: Penalties
context: ยง431:8-320 Penalties. (a) Any surplus lines broker who in this State represents or aids an unauthorized insurer in violation of this article may be fined not more than $1,000. (b) In addition to any other penalty provided for in this part or otherwise provided by law, including any suspension, revocation or refusal to renew a license, any person, firm, association or corporation violating any provisions of this article shall be liable to a penalty not exceeding $1,000 for the first offense, and not exceeding $2,000 for each succeeding offense. &copy; The above penalties are not exclusive remedies, penalties may also be assessed under article 13. [L 1987, c 347, pt of ยง2]
